author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four persons were injured in a group clash during a temple festival at Thumbaipatti near Melur on Friday evening.

The police said that when members of one group took out a procession during the four-day celebration of Panguni festival at Veerakaliamman temple, a clash broke out between them with another group. Four men sustained injuries in the attack.

Superintendent of Police Vijayendra Bidari rushed to the spot. Additional police force has been deployed. Investigation is under way.
title: Group clash near Melur
